entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
